name: Essence of violet
description:
This piece is a part of my Spring series, which I am currently reworking. The idea behind this artwork was to envelop and capture the model as well as the observer in a blooming fragrance.
Originally named “The Essense of Violet”, the concept grew out of its initial restraints to encompass four different colour variations representing four different aromas and the feelings they arouse. Whichever one is your favourite, I hope its scent is as vivid to you as its colours are.
